titleInfo.title: Billy Block's Western Beat American Music Showcase Eight Year Anniversary

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and split fountain, purple to orange, on white) announcing Billy Block's Western Beat American Music Showcase Eight Year Anniversary featuring the Bum Steers, Wendy Waldman, Steve Ferguson, Kenny Edwards, Angelo, Steve Cochran, Paul Marshall, Reeva Hunter, Jimmy Muffin, Lois Blaisch, Eddie Cunningham, Craig Lackey, Randy Sharp, Tom Kell, and Stokes Nielson hosted by Billy Block at the Highland Grounds on August 5. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Western Beat logo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
